treasure: NPC gear (leather armor, 4 darts, net, short sword, other treasure)

sections.name: Swamp Stride
sections.text: A grippli can move through difficult terrain at its normal speed while within a swamp. Magically altered terrain affects a grippli normally.

These small, intelligent, humanoid tree frogs live in primitive societies deep in the forests and marshes of the world. They hunt giant insects and eat fruits and flowers from their tree homes. They often barter with more advanced creatures for metal and gemstone ornaments.

Grippli hatchlings develop into adults in less than a year. Unless they meet a savage end from a forest threat, they can live 60 years, their skin graying and losing its luster as they age. A grippli stands just over 2 feet in height and weighs 30 pounds.
Gripplis are nimble and alert, but spindly.
sections.name: +2 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom, -2 Strength

sections.text: Gripplis have a base speed of 30 feet and a base climb speed of 20 feet.
sections.name: Fast Speed

sections.text: Gripplis can see in the dark up to 60 feet.
sections.name: Darkvision

sections.text: +4 Stealth in marshes or forested areas.
sections.name: Camouflage

sections.text: Gripplis speak Common and Grippli. Gripplis with high Int scores can choose from the following: Boggard, Draconic, Elven, Gnome, Goblin, Sylvan.
sections.name: Languages
Grippli
sections.text: Gripplis are defined by their class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. They have the following racial traits.

description: Its slick skin a mottled pattern of bright colors, this agile, frog-like humanoid carries a bow and wears leather armor.
name: Grippli
skills: Acrobatics +4, Climb +13, Handle Animal +3, Heal +7, Perception +5, Stealth +11, (+15 in forests or marshes) Survival +7
organization: solitary, gang (2-5), pack (6-11), or tribe (21-30 plus 1 cleric leader of 3rd level)
